tossup_question: -   –  If one side of a right triangle is 14 inches and its opposite angle is 30 degrees, what is the diameter of the circle circumscribed around this triangle?
bonus_question: -   –  A particle’s position is defined by the equation x(t) = 2t^3– 15t^2 + 24t – 60. At what times t is the particle at rest?
